definition: an ethical or moral principle that inhibits action, have doubts about
details:
noun
- an ethical or moral principle that inhibits action
- uneasiness about the fitness of an action
= synonyms: misgiving
- a unit of apothecary weight equal to 20 grains
verb
- have doubts about
- raise scruples
= example: raise scruples
- hesitate on moral grounds
= example: hesitate on moral grounds
